generated_text:
- road: The image shows a multi-lane road with visible lane markings and vehicles driving on it.
- building: Tall buildings are visible on both sides of the road, including one on the left with commercial signage.
- vegetation: Numerous trees with green leaves are present along the road and sidewalks.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the trees and buildings.
- person: A person is visible walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the image.

- traffic light: Traffic lights are visible at the intersection, including one showing a green light.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting traffic lights and signs.
- traffic sign: Traffic signs are visible, including a "REWE" sign and other directional signs.
- sidewalk: Sidewalks are visible along the sides of the road, with pedestrians walking on them.
